# The `MaskedScatterSDNode` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

### isTruncatingStore() {#ae2522b8300a328b97f5e8254a7abe9a7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::MaskedScatterSDNode::isTruncatingStore () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return true if the op does a truncation before store.

For integers this is the same as doing a TRUNCATE and storing the result. For floats, it is the same as doing an FP&#95;ROUND and storing the result.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h/#l03001">3001</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
